QuestData.Title: Bronze Claws
QuestData.Description: Among the Shan'ze's fiercest and most loyal creations are their quilen.$B$BThese beasts will hunt until they kill their prey, or die in the process.$B$BI need you to not only cull their numbers, but also to retrieve their bronze claws.$B$BTheir claws are strong and razor sharp, and we can use them to make weapons and hooks for our cause.
